title: imstack
description: Stacks up a set of 2D images into one big file (a la MGH).

data_type.title: Output data type
data_type.description: Converts the output data file to be 'type', which is either 'short' or 'float'. The default type is the type of the first image.

output_prefix.title: Output prefix
output_prefix.description: Names the output files to be 'name'.b'type' and 'name'.hdr. The default name is 'obi-wan-kenobi'.
